CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Hide net-zero transactions
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: For each regular transaction, Sia also makes a transaction that has a net effect on your wallet of zero, to confirm the value. Check this to hide transactions that do not affect your balance

ListPreference.android:title: Operation Mode
ListPreference.android:summary: Either interface with your own remote full node, or retrieve data from a server and build transactions locally and upload them to the server

EditTextPreference.android:summary: The IP address and port number of your remote full node. If you are not on the same network as it, you will have to port forward it

EditTextPreference.android:title: API password
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The API password set on your remote full node
